    Slack Basics

    • `@here` to notify members who are currently `active`. This sends a notification to all the members who are active.
      Refer: https://get.slack.help/hc/en-us/articles/202009646-Make-an-announcement
    • Reduce noise for yourself:
      Refer: https://get.slack.help/hc/en-us/articles/218551977-Reducing-noise-in-Slack
    • Replying to messages / comments via `message threads:
      Refer: https://get.slack.help/hc/en-us/articles/115000769927-Message-threads
